game.name: Scavland
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: Scavland is a hardcore, top-down pixel art survival game set in a Post-Apocalyptic Soviet Era. Explore a world ravaged by war and the deadly Mist, scavenging for resources, taking risky jobs, and seeking refuge in harsh settlements. The wasteland is relentless—everything is out to kill you.
